statements: SELECT * FROM monthly_budget;
SELECT month, income FROM monthly_budget WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT * FROM monthly_budget ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT month, income FROM monthly_budget WHERE month BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(income) AS avg_income, AVG(expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM monthly_budget;
SELECT * FROM monthly_budget WHERE income >= 5000 AND expenses <= 3000 ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT month, income FROM monthly_budget WHERE month BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT month, expenses FROM monthly_budget WHERE expenses > 2000 ORDER BY month ASC
SELECT month, income, expenses FROM monthly_budget WHERE month = '2022-03-01'
SELECT month, income - expenses AS savings FROM monthly_budget ORDER BY savings DESC
SELECT * FROM incomes ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC
SELECT id, description FROM incomes WHERE description LIKE '%salary%'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 AND date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, description FROM expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT id, description, amount FROM incomes WHERE id = 10
SELECT * FROM incomes WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, description, amount FROM incomes WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE description LIKE '%food%';
SELECT id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM incomes GROUP BY id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyIncome;
SELECT month, income FROM MonthlyIncome WHERE income > 5000;
SELECT month, expense FROM MonthlyExpenses ORDER BY expense DESC;
SELECT id, total_budget FROM BudgetTracking WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyIncome WHERE month = 'January';
SELECT * FROM MonthlyIncome ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT month, income FROM MonthlyIncome WHERE income > 5000;
SELECT month, expense FROM MonthlyExpenses WHERE month='January';
SELECT month, total_budget FROM BudgetTracking WHERE total_budget < 10000 ORDER BY month DESC;

SELECT MI.month, MI.income, ME.expense, BT.total_budget FROM MonthlyIncome MI JOIN MonthlyExpenses ME ON MI.month = ME.month JOIN BudgetTracking BT ON MI.month = BT.month WHERE MI.income > BT.total_budget;
SELECT * FROM Income ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source, amount FROM Income WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, month, year FROM Budget WHERE year = 2022;

SELECT Transactions.id, Transactions.amount, Income.source, Expenses.category FROM Transactions INNER JOIN Income ON Transactions.income_id = Income.id INNER JOIN Expenses ON Transactions.expense_id = Expenses.id;
SELECT * FROM Income WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Income GROUP BY source HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Budget WHERE year = 2021 AND (total_income - total_expenses) > 5000 ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT Expenses.category, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM Transactions JOIN Expenses ON Transactions.expense_id = Expenses.id GROUP BY Expenses.category HAVING transaction_count > 3;

SELECT Transactions.date, Income.amount AS income_amount, Expenses.amount AS expense_amount FROM Transactions JOIN Income ON Transactions.income_id = Income.id JOIN Expenses ON Transactions.expense_id = Expenses.id;
SELECT * FROM monthly_incomes;
SELECT id, month, income FROM monthly_incomes ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT SUM(income) AS total_income FROM monthly_incomes;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE id IN (SELECT category_id FROM income_categories);
SELECT month, expense FROM monthly_expenses WHERE expense > 1000 ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_incomes WHERE income > 5000 ORDER BY month DESC;

SELECT category_name, SUM(income) AS total_income FROM categories JOIN income_categories ON categories.id = income_categories.category_id JOIN monthly_incomes ON income_categories.income_id = monthly_incomes.id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT category_name, month, expense FROM categories JOIN expense_categories ON categories.id = expense_categories.category_id JOIN monthly_expenses ON expense_categories.expense_id = monthly_expenses.id WHERE month BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM monthly_incomes WHERE month = '2022-07-01';

SELECT category_name, month, income, expense FROM ((income_categories JOIN categories ON income_categories.category_id = categories.id) JOIN monthly_incomes ON income_categories.income_id = monthly_incomes.id) JOIN monthly_expenses ON income_categories.income_id = monthly_expenses.id ORDER BY month ASC;
